title: Hour 2 - Jordan McPherson (07-27-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Jordan McPherson (07-27-20)
description:
Dan and company wonder if Kansas City quarterback Patrick Mahomes would have received such a hefty new deal had he not won the Super Bowl this past February. And Miami Marlins beat writer Jordan McPherson drops in to share details about MLB's Covid-19 case surge within certain teams and the ensuing cancellation of games.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
